title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Intelligent Observability & Modernization w/ Amazon OpenSearch Service (ANT315)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon OpenSearch Service 实现智能可观测性和现代化 (ANT315)
abstract: Discover how Amazon OpenSearch Service is evolving beyond traditional search and analytics to power next-generation observability. We'll showcase how organizations can reduce operational costs by modernizing their observability stack using OpenTelemetry, OpenSearch, S3, and CloudWatch. We'll demonstrate building sophisticated observability solutions that combine OpenSearch's real-time analytics with AI-powered insights using Amazon Q.
abstract_cn: 探索Amazon OpenSearch Service如何超越传统搜索和分析，为下一代可观测性提供动力。我们将展示组织如何通过使用OpenTelemetry、OpenSearch、S3和CloudWatch现代化其可观测性堆栈来降低运营成本。我们将演示构建复杂的可观测性解决方案，将OpenSearch的实时分析与使用Amazon Q的AI驱动洞察相结合。
